channel.title: Quick rant here
channel.description:
sup
k so, I've been noticing that some kiddies on this forum go around and put lists in their signature of people who they like/dislike.
Here's my rant:
Who the fuck gives a shit? Seriously, no one gives a flying fuck who you respect on these forums, nor do they care if you don't respect someone, it's not like if you put "omg derp is a huge faggot" in your signature automatically means everyone is going to disrespect that person. Now I'm not ranting cause I see my name in a lot of @$$H0l33!11one and ur a faggot11 lists, it honestly makes me laugh, but seriously. You're pathetic attempts of insulting someone can only be expressed through signature because you know you have no chance in a real argument with them, the only reason perhaps that they disrespect you is because you're a fucking incoherent moron that thinks something like that offends people.
My message to those people: Grow the fuck up, being as ignorant as that is going to get you no where in life and I suggest you kill yourselves if you don't intend to grow up.
oh and inb4 tl;dr, cool story bro, etc.

item.title: Quick rant here
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:7, topic:331005"][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=427327.msg3142371#msg3142371 date=1267709995]

AlrigHt YES this needs to be fucking stoppEd!!

I find myself in WAY to many fucking hated lists, I believe it is because I am unloveable.
Why do I find myself screaming into a pillow when I get home? BECAUSE I’M FUCKING HATED BY A MOPARSCAPER THATS WHY. Why can’t they be nice to me :((
[/quote][quote author=`Alec link=topic=427327.msg3142171#msg3142171 date=1267672098]

Why do I find myself screaming into a pillow when I get home? BECAUSE I’M FUCKING HATED BY A MOPARSCAPER THATS WHY.
[/quote]wut.

THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I AM TALKING ABOUT. STOP CYBER BULLYING ME OMG. lEAve ME ALONE PLEASE

Can you shut the fuck up? Its just a list it means nothing because were on the INTERNET, Ive been in lists there nothing but shit and shouldn’t toy with your mind unless you let it.

troll’d

lool yes jmood I go home screaming into a pillow that inbreds in afgan put me in a list.

i vent my troubles through smashing walls with my cock[/quote]

Sounds intresting, I was led to believe you needed to grow a pair of bollocks.

item.title: Quick rant here
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:53, topic:330955”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=427327.msg3141297#msg3141297 date=1267559192]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=427327.msg3138508#msg3138508 date=1267280734]

Well tough titties, he is a faggot and I am sure many others will agree.
[/quote]<3 `Lewk_, I just don’t put it in my signature. He’s been around about as long as I have, so it’s like we grew up together. He, along with many other members, makes this community what it is, there’s no denying that.

That’s not a good thing…

People often complain about how bad this community turned out, and now that I see when OP registered, it all makes sense.
[/quote]I never noted that when I said “what makes this community”, I was referring to the bad part. I’m talking about the community as a whole. There is a cycle of negative and positive and forms a neutral overall. That neutral overall is what I view as moparscape, I don’t look at how horrible this community is because I’m here and I know how it is. Sure, some days it’s worse than others, but it’s better than any other community I’ve been to. That’s what `Lewk_ contributes to, the entertaining part of moparscape.[/quote]

`Lewk_ flames everyone and trolls. When was the last time you saw a constructive post by him?

Look at his last posts and you’ll see what I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick rant here
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:45, topic:330955"][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=427327.msg3139076#msg3139076 date=1267315993]
It’s the internet?

This whole topic is fucking retarded.

/thread
[/quote]
No shit it’s the fucking internet, you’re an idiot. Just because I posted a topic on it doesn’t mean it bothers me. It’s completely immature, obviously so are you[/quote]

Why do you care enough about it to make a fucking topic about it then? If you didn’t care and it didn’t bother you, then you wouldn’t have spent the time making a semi-big post dropping f-bombs. But the point of me posting on your topic isn’t trying to get you to admit that you care and it bothers you. It’s to help you come to the realization that making this topic was fucking pointless, unnecessary, and a waste of your time and it’s the internet where you’re surrounded by millions of people you don’t know and they’re bound to talk, as well as do stupid shit. And why? Well why not? They’re sitting behind their computer screen in the comfort of their own home. So how was me posting on your topic justify me being an idiot in any way? If anything, you seem like the idiot making a topic about something as stupid as ranting about respected and haters lists.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick rant here
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:45, topic:330955"][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=427327.msg3138497#msg3138497 date=1267279984]
So you expect people to not put you in their hated lists? You came to my site and posted nothing but spam topics containing gay porn, you dick.
[/quote]

That was fucking hilarious, and a lot of people on IRC agree. I never said omg y amm i hat3deed so mach??//one1quiestionsmarke. I dont see why you would even state that, as I never said it in the first place.

@Lewk_ - it’s was damn right obvious that this topic was gonna start WWIII off. I dunno why you had to make a topic on the issue anyway. If you don’t like someones Signiture ask the to remove it using the PM system. thats what it was designed for.

As if I stated that I cared, which I honestly don’t. I find it hilarious, it’s just immature.

It’s the internet?

This whole topic is fucking retarded.

/thread

No shit it’s the fucking internet, you’re an idiot. Just because I posted a topic on it doesn’t mean it bothers me. It’s completely immature, obviously so are you

Once again, as I stated in the OP. It’s not because it bothers me, I even said I find it hilarious, you’re all just weak and you should just kill yourselves.[/quote][quote=“ollie123, post:46, topic:330955”]You are such a tool…[/quote]

No, you stated nothing, I stated that I didn’t care. Besides if you don’t care why make a topic then? I require an answer, Yuo seem to have one, for everything so it shouldn’t be a problem right?
Congrats 'Lewk_ Your a twat.

@ollie - Aimed whom may i ask?
